doc:
Erick Ray Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erick_Ray_Evans 0 Erick Ray Evans (December 29, 1945 – August 21, 1999) was an American actor best known for his part as David Theroux in the BBC science-fiction drama Star Cops.Evans was born in America, where he only got small parts in various movies and television shows, such as the Supergirl movie, as well as stage work. After moving to the United Kingdom, he was cast in Chris Boucher's Star Cops series as the second in command. While filming the last episode of Star Cops, he contracted chicken pox. He also starred in The New Statesman alongside Rik Mayall, and Stay Lucky! with Niall Toibin. Other TV credits include The Bill and Casualty. Erick_Ray_Evans ( December_29_,_1945 – August_21_,_1999 ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_part as David_Theroux in the_BBC_science-fiction_drama_Star_Cops.Evans was_born in America , where he only got small_parts in various_movies_and_television_shows , such_as the_Supergirl_movie , as_well_as stage_work . After moving to the_United_Kingdom , he was_cast in Chris_Boucher 's_Star_Cops_series as the_second in command . While filming the_last_episode of Star_Cops , he contracted chicken_pox . He also starred in The_New_Statesman alongside Rik_Mayall , and Stay_Lucky ! with Niall_Toibin . Other_TV_credits include The_Bill_and_Casualty .
